atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use @layer to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Use @config to specify which config file Tailwind should use.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use @theme to define your design tokens inline in CSS (Tailwind v4).

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Use @custom-variant to create custom variant modifiers (Tailwind v4).

atDirectives.name: @plugin
atDirectives.description: Use @plugin to register plugins directly in CSS (Tailwind v4).

atDirectives.name: @source
atDirectives.description: Use @source to define content paths (Tailwind v4).

atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: Standard CSS import statement, also used to import Tailwind.

atDirectives.name: @utility
atDirectives.description: Use @utility to create custom utility classes (Tailwind v4).
